attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government SHOULD FORCE the BANKS to LEND MONEY AND reduce their interest rates along with the BANK OF ENGLAND.
No BONUS s SHOULD BE ALLOWED UNTIL BANKS ARE BACK IN PROFIT.
ALSO HARD WORKING PEOPLE WHO HAVE LOST JOBS OR GOT INTO DIFFICULTY SHOULD BY LAW BE ALLOWED TO PAY HALF PAYMENTS ON THEIR MORTGAGE.STOP REPOSSESSIONS NOW BEFORE ITS TOO LATE!FORCE BANKS TO ACCEPT HALF PAYMENTS IF FINANCIAL CIRCUMSTANCES CHANGE.START HELPING WORKING PEOPLE FOR A CHANGE!WHO HAVE WORKED HARD AND NOW FACE DIFFICULTY TOO.FORCE BANKS TO ACCEPT HALF MORTGAGE PAYMENTS FOR 12 MONTHS.They have done it in SPAIN...lets do it here??

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
